MANAGER, TRANSLATIONAL ONCOLOGY FACILITY As part of a strategic plan to expand efforts in the application of molecular tools to the conduct of clinical trials, Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center (MSKCC) invites applications for Manager of a new Translational Oncology Core Facility. We are looking for a dynamic scientist to assume day-to-day responsibility for a facility that will interface with existing MSKCC Core Facilities in Pathology, Genomics and The Center for Cancer Bioinformatics to conduct multi-parameter molecular analyses of clinical material.
